barista_admin_record.MSG_TEXT: This program will create warehouse records for those items that have not already been[$0a$]set up in the new warehouse. The new records will zero out the Physical Count, [$0a$]Landed Cost, Last Purchase Cost, On Hand, On Order and Committed Quantity[$0a$]numeric fields. All other numeric fields from the old warehouse will be copied. Of the[$0a$]remaining character fields, the Cycle Code, Distribution Code, Buyer Code,[$0a$]Restocking Vendor, Price Codes, ABC, EOQ, Order Point and Safety Stock[$0a$]codes will be copied from the old warehouse. All other character fields will be[$0a$]re-initialized. Do you wish to continue?[$0a$]
